string-array.name: professor_descriptions
string-array.item: Expert in all lengths of wires.
Has tenure, a big research grant, access to a lab, and five graduate students (at least three of them Chinese). It is also apparent that he is a jackass.
Ethan \"Bubblegum\" Tate is the commander of the Globetrotters and senior lecturer of physics at Globetrotter University.
